arts.sum: Goalkeeper Matz Sels proved to be the hero for a second successive round in the shoot-out to send Forest through.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest's FA Cup dream remains alive as Matz Sels gamble pays off
arts.sum: NOTTINGHAM FOREST 1-1 IPSWICH TOWN (Pens: 5-4): Nuno Espirito Santo's men came through a penalty shootout to book their place in the FA Cup quarter-finals

arts.ttl: Highlights: Nottingham Forest beat Ipswich on penalties
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest reach the quarter-finals of the FA Cup after beating Ipswich Town on penalties following a 1-1 draw at the City Ground.

arts.ttl: Matz Sels saves in shootout as Forest beat Ipswich to reach FA Cup quarter-final
arts.sum: Nottingham Forestâ€™s dream season continued as they moved one step closer to a first trophy since 1990.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest reaches FA Cup quarterfinals after Sels stops Ipswich in shootout
arts.sum: Goalkeeper Matz Sels was the hero for Nottingham Forest as he saved the last penalty in a shootout to take his team past Ipswich Town and into the quarterfinals of the FA Cup on Monday. The teams were tied 1-1 after 90 minutes and extra time and the first nine takers all converted their penalties in a nail-biting finale.

arts.ttl: Matz Sels is FA Cup shootout hero as Nottingham Forest edge out Ipswich
arts.athr: Will Unwin at the City Ground
arts.sum: Sometimes football is a game of four halves, and on this occasion three of them were devoid of quality. In the end, only one moment truly mattered and that was Matz Selsâ€™ penalty shootout save from Jack Taylor to send Nottingham Forest into the FA Cup quarter-finals at Ipswichâ€™s expense. George Hirst and Ryan Yates exchanged goals in the second half of normal time, when the game finally came to life, but no one could source a winner prior to the shootout after a forgettable extra time. arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest 1-1 Ipswich (5-4 pens): Highlights, man of the match, stats as saviour Matz Sels sends Forest through
arts.sum: Matz Sels is Nottingham Forest's saviour, stopping the final penalty to secure a shootout victory after a 1-1 draw with Ipswich Town in the FA Cup.

arts.ttl: Referee Tony Harrington told he missed a red card during Nottingham Forest vs Ipswich Town
arts.sum: He could have a point but we'll take it...ðŸ˜…

arts.ttl: Sels saves Taylor's penalty to send Forest through
arts.sum: Matz Sels saves Jack Taylor's penalty to send Nottingham Forest into the quarter-finals of the FA Cup after a 1-1 draw against Ipswich Town.
